name: melodiously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is very pleasant to listen to: The birds on the branches above sang as melodiously as any I have ever heard. She pronounced the sounds so melodiously that even the city's name seemed like music.
More examplesFewer examplesTheir voices were melodiously sweet and harmonious as they sang the chorus.She melodiously called "Come in" to the knock on the door at the appointed time.They started to chant the words melodiously along with the sounds of the bells.
